jsonLdInfo.title: Replace microdata with JSON-LD
jsonLdInfo.content: In the Shopware standard, the rich snippets are transferred using so-called microdata in the source code. If the following option is active, this microdata is removed from the source code and replaced by the JSON-LD rich snippets recommended by Google.

text.authorSnippet: Open the text module configuration in a new window
text.homeTextSnippet: Open the text module configuration for the start page description in a new window

labels.defaultItemCondition: Default value for the condition of the products
labels.defaultAvailability: Default value for the availability of normal products
labels.defaultAvailabilityOutOfStock: Standard value for the availability of normal products without stock
labels.defaultAvailabilityClearanceSale: Default value for the availability of clearance sales products
labels.defaultAvailabilityClearanceSaleOutOfSto: Standard value for the availability of clearance sales products without stock
labels.skuCompilation: Standard value for the Dealer-specific identifier (sku)
labels.mpnCompilation: Standard value for the Manufacturer Part Number (mpn)
labels.priceValidUntilInterval: Default value for the field "Price valid until date" (priceValidUntil)
labels.productShowInBreadcrumbMode: Product page as a separate breadcrumb element
labels.homeShowInBreadcrumbMode: Home as a separate breadcrumb element

helpText.defaultAvailability:
Normal products are all main articles and variants that are not marked for clearance sale.

The value defined here is only output if no different availability has been defined in the details of the respective product.
helpText.defaultItemCondition: The value defined here is only output if no deviating product condition has been defined in the details of the respective product.
helpText.skuCompilation: The value defined here is only output if no different SKU number has been defined in the details of the respective product.
helpText.mpnCompilation: The value defined here is only output if no different MPN number has been defined in the details of the respective product.
helpText.priceValidUntilInterval: The value defined here is only output if no different date has been defined in the details of the respective product.
helpText.authorCompilation: Google recommends transferring the name of the author when evaluating. At this point you can configure which value is transferred as the author.
helpText.productShowInBreadcrumbMode:
By default, only the categories are output as a breadcrumb on the detail page.

If this option is activated, a separate element is added to the breadcrumb for the detail page.
helpText.homeShowInBreadcrumbMode:
By default, only the categories are output as a breadcrumb.

If this option is activated, the first element is added to the breadcrumb for the start page.

availabilities.UseDefault: Transfer default value (SEO Professional »Rich Snippets (JSON-LD)» Products)

itemConditions.UseDefault: Use default value (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)

skuCompilations.UseDefault: Use default value (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)
skuCompilations.manufacturerNumberOtherwiseProductNumber: Manufacturer number if available, otherwise product number

mpnCompilations.UseDefault: Use default value (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)
mpnCompilations.manufacturerNumberOtherwiseProductNumber: Manufacturer number if available, otherwise product number (recommended)

priceValidUntilIntervals.UseDefault: Use default value (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)
priceValidUntilIntervals.notDisplay: Do not display this field by default
priceValidUntilIntervals.customDays: Current date + own number of days

reviewAuthorCompilations.UseDefault: Use default value (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)
reviewAuthorCompilations.notDisplay: Do not display this field by default
reviewAuthorCompilations.firstNameAndFirstLetterOfLastName: First name + initial letter of the customer's last name (recommended)
reviewAuthorCompilations.firstNameAndLastName: Pass the customer's first name and surname (customer consent required!)

product.shopAndJsonLd: Show in shop and transfer via rich snippet
